description.value:
Acid

Aura 3

The aura is difficult terrain for enemies, and enemies in the aura do not benefit from acid resistance. Any enemy that ends its turn in the aura while Olhydra is bloodied takes 30 acid damage.

Aura 3

Nonmagical fire cannot be lit within the aura, and any such fire brought into the aura is immediately extinguished. While Olhydra is not bloodied, the area within the aura is lightly obscured for enemies outside the aura.
Enemies can't gain combat advantage by flanking Olhydra.
Olhydra can breathe underwater. In aquatic combat, she gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against nonaquatic creatures.
When Olhydra starts her turn, any dazing, immobilizing, restraining, slowing, or stunning effect on her ends.

While squeezing, Olhydra moves at full speed rather than half speed, she doesn't take the -5 penalty to attack rolls, and she doesn't grant combat advantage for squeezing. Olhydra can't be knocked prone, and she ignores difficult terrain.
Whenever a cold attack hits Olhydra, she gains vulnerable 15 to the next attack that hits her before the start of her next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Before making the attack, Olhydra pushes creatures adjacent to the target up to 2 squares.

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature); +36 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 + 25 damage, Olhydra grabs the target (escape DC 34), and ongoing 15 damage until the grab ends.

Miss: Olhydra pushes the target up to 4 squares.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Olhydra uses wave slam three times, or four times if she is bloodied.

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ acid, teleportation

Standard

Attack: Close burst 3 (enemies in the burst)

+36 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 5d12 + 27 damage, and ongoing 20 acid damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).

Effect: Olhydra teleports to a space, one square of which must be within the burst. Any creatures grabbed by her teleport with her and remain grabbed in a space of her choice within 4 squares of her (or within her space if the creatures started the teleportation there).

At-Will

Move

Effect: Olhydra moves up to her speed, and creatures grabbed by her are pulled with her, remaining grabbed in a space of her choice within 4 squares of her (or in her space if the creatures started the movement there). This movement provokes no opportunity attacks from the grabbed creatures.

Recharge when Olhydra spends an action point ✦ charm, psychic

Minor

Attack: Close burst 10 (enemies in the burst)

+36 vs. Will

Hit: 1d12 + 25 psychic damage, and Olhydra pulls the target up to twice its speed.

system.rechargeCondition: when Olhydra spends an action point

description.value:
At-Will

Minor

Attack: Melee 4 (one enemy grabbed by Olhydra)

+36 vs. Fortitude

Hit: Olhydra pulls the target into her space, where it remains grabbed (escape DC 36), and it is dazed and takes ongoing 30 damage until the grab ends.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: Olhydra is first bloodied.

Effect (No Action): Any immobilizing, restraining, or slowing effect on Olhydra ends. She moves up to her speed + 2. During the move, she can move through enemies' spaces, she has resist 30 to all damage, and she can't be immobilized, restrained, slowed, or otherwise hindered or stopped from moving by any attack or effect. Each time she enters an enemy's space for the first time during the move, she uses wave slam against that enemy.

system.biography:
HP 1216; Bloodied 608
Resist 30 cold Vulnerable 10 fire Immune acid, disease, dominated, petrification 		Init +22 | AP 3 | Save +5
AC 45Fort 46Ref 45Will 46
Speed 6, swim 12
Ability ScoresStr 29 (+25)
Con 32 (+27)		Dex 22 (+22)
Int 27 (+24)		Wis 25 (+23)
Cha 29 (+25)
Languages Common, Primordial
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Senses Blindsight 5,Darkvision
Passive Perception 33 | Insight 33
